body.raw: As one of the earlier encounters, this is yet another simple fight. There are none of the usual phase-based mechanics you see with other council fights, just a lot of cleave. ## Mechanics Refer to [Mythic Trap â€” The Primal Council](https://www.mythictrap.com/en/vault/primalCouncil) for detailed visuals and animations of the mechanics. They have been listed here for reference. ### Kadros Icewrath Kadros will channel a freezing storm when reaching 100 energy, applying a stacking DoT that deals 4.8k Frost damage every second, increaes Frost damage taken by 10%, and reduces Fire damage by 10%, for 15 seconds. If you reach 10 stacks you will be entombed in a [Frost Tomb](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=371591?dd=15), dealing damage every second until freed. This debuff can be cleared by dipping into [Scorched Ground](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=371514?dd=15). An interruptable spell the boss casts that inflicts 48,065 frost damage. Upon defeat, Kadros will channel [Glacial Convocation](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=386440?dd=15) until the other council members are defeated. This deals 48,065 frost damage to all players every 6 seconds, and increases over time. ### Dathea Stormlash Dathea will apply [Conductive Mark](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=371624?dd=15) to several players that deals 34,444 nature damage on impact and 15,455 nature damage every 2 seconds for 20 seconds. Each tick of the DoT increases nature damage taken by 8%. Coming within 5 yards of another player will copy the effect onto the player. However, coming within 5 yards of an [Earthen Pillar](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=370991?dd=15) will remove the mark. On Mythic, the mark is permanent and must be removed with a pillar. An interruptable spell the boss casts that inflicts 48,065 nature damage. Inflicts 24,032 damage to a random player and arcs to other nearby players. Unavoidable healer work. Upon defeat, Dathea will channel [Storming Convocation](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=386375?dd=15) until the other council members are defeated. This deals 48,065 nature damage to all players every 6 seconds, and increases over time. ### Opalfang Opalfang summons pillars under several players, dealing 120,162 nature damage and knocking players back if they are hit. Each pillar emits [Quacking Pulse](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=396328?dd=15), dealing 2,403 nature damage every 2 seconds to the entire raid until destroyed with [Meteor Axes](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=374038?dd=15). Players with [Conductive Mark](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=371624?dd=15) can rub their body on the pillar to remove the debuff. Inflicts 240,325 physical damage to her current target and applies a 100% physical damage vulnerability, stacking. This is a standard alternating tank swap. Upon defeat, Opalfang will channel [Quaking Convocation](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=386370?dd=15) until the other council members are defeated. This deals 48,065 nature damage to all players every 6 seconds, and increases over time. ### Embar Firepath Embar targets 2 players and throws axes at them, inflicting 309,101 fire damage split between all targets within 10 yards of the targeted player and increases damage taken from [Meteor Axes](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=374038?dd=15) by 300% for 15 seconds. The axes are thrown in sequence, meaning both axes cannot be stacked as the second hit will be after the vulnerability is applied, so two separate soak groups are needed (melee, ranged). Each Axe spawns [Scorched Ground](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=371514?dd=15) miasma which is used to clear [Primal Blizzard](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=371836?dd=15) debuffs. Ember will cast a frontal cleave attack at 100 energy that deals 192,260 fire damage and an additional 48,065 damage every 1.5 seconds for 15 seconds, stacking. Don't be in front of the boss or die. Upon defeat, Embar will channel [Burning Convocation](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=386289?dd=15) until the other council members are defeated. This deals 48,065 nature damage to all players every 6 seconds, and increases over time. ## Strategy This council fight doesn't have any phases, just mechanics from one boss being countered by another. Positioning recommendations are unclear as baiting the pillars is wonky. - The bosses need to be killed evenly. A defeated boss becomes invulnerable and they channel raid damage u - There are three important mechanical interactions: - Ranged need to default to staying spread to avoid duplicating [Conductive Mark](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=371624?dd=15), and then clear these debuffs by rubbing [Earthen Pillars](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=370991?dd=15). - When Kadros is channeling [Primal Blizzard](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=371836?dd=15), dip into the [Scorched Ground](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=371514?dd=15) flame patches created by [Meteor Axes](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=374038?dd=15) to not end up a popsicle. - The two players who get [Meteor Axes](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=374038?dd=15) need to stand ontop of [Earthen Pillars](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=370991?dd=15) to destroy them while 3-4 other players help soak each meteor. The meteors have to be soaked separately due to the vulnerability. - Interrupt Kadros' [Frost Spike](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=372315?dd=15) and Dathea's [Lightning Bolt](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=372394) so players don't die to overlapping mechanics and keep these casters in melee for cleave. - Avoid Embar's [Slashing Blaze](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=372027?dd=15) frontal cleave, and the emergence of [Earthen Pillars](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=370991?dd=15). ## Video
